Texto Termos de Localização:
What is the main purpose of the app?
The main activity of the application is the organization of field activities, optimizing the user's travel from the initial point to the destination where the service will be performed, without the need to return to the base to proceed to the next service.

Why does the app need access to the location in the background?
The travel of the user between calls is made online (real time) or next time when connected to mobile internet or wi-fi network. The points generated when traveling between appointments can be used mainly for user reimbursement and better management of travel between activities.
Necessário internet para registro do ace: In order to accept all terms, active internet connection is required, please try again when it is available
